statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_management ORDER BY product_id DESC, stock_quantity ASC
SELECT hub_name, product_name, stock_quantity FROM inventory_management WHERE stock_quantity > 50
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory_management WHERE hub_id = 3
SELECT hub_id, hub_name, product_name FROM inventory_management WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM inventory_management ORDER BY hub_name ASC
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE stock_quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC, hub_name ASC
SELECT hub_name, SUM(stock_quantity) AS total_stock FROM inventory_management GROUP BY hub_name HAVING COUNT(product_id) > 5
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory_management WHERE product_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY product_id
SELECT hub_name, AVG(stock_quantity) AS average_stock FROM inventory_management GROUP BY hub_name HAVING AVG(stock_quantity) > 50
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE hub_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_levels
SELECT id, product_name, current_stock, min_stock_threshold FROM inventory_levels
SELECT * FROM delivery_hubs
SELECT location, capacity FROM delivery_hubs
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE min_stock_threshold < 10 ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT delivery_hub_id, COUNT(*) as total_products FROM inventory_levels GROUP BY delivery_hub_id HAVING total_products > 5;
SELECT product_name, location FROM inventory_levels INNER JOIN delivery_hubs ON inventory_levels.delivery_hub_id = delivery_hubs.id WHERE inventory_levels.current_stock < delivery_hubs.capacity;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_name LIKE '%desk%' AND current_stock > 0 ORDER BY current_stock DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_level LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory_level WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT id, hub_name, location FROM delivery_hub ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT product_id, hub_id, quantity_available FROM stock_availability WHERE quantity_available < 100 ORDER BY quantity_available ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, hub_id FROM inventory_level JOIN stock_availability ON inventory_level.id = stock_availability.product_id WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory_level ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, hub_name FROM inventory_level INNER JOIN delivery_hub ON inventory_level.delivery_hub_id = delivery_hub.id;
SELECT * FROM delivery_hub WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, quantity_available FROM inventory_level INNER JOIN stock_availability ON inventory_level.id = stock_availability.product_id;
SELECT product_name, quantity, hub_name, location FROM inventory_level INNER JOIN delivery_hub ON inventory_level.delivery_hub_id = delivery_hub.id ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_hub;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT hub_id, hub_location FROM delivery_hub WHERE hub_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM inventory JOIN product ON inventory.product_id = product.product_id;
SELECT * FROM delivery_hub;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT hub_location, COUNT(*) AS total_inventory FROM delivery_hub INNER JOIN inventory ON delivery_hub.hub_id = inventory.hub_id GROUP BY hub_location;

SELECT product.product_name, inventory.quantity, sales.quantity_sold FROM product INNER JOIN inventory ON product.product_id = inventory.product_id INNER JOIN sales ON product.product_id = sales.product_id;
SELECT hub_location, SUM(sales.quantity_sold) AS total_sales FROM delivery_hub INNER JOIN sales ON delivery_hub.hub_id = sales.hub_id GROUP BY hub_location ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_hubs;
SELECT hub_name, location FROM delivery_hubs ORDER BY hub_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM inventory_items WHERE item_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT delivery_date, status FROM deliveries WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT hub_id, hub_name, location FROM delivery_hubs;
SELECT item_name, price, item_description FROM inventory_items ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT delivery_date, status FROM deliveries WHERE status='Delivered';
SELECT item_name, item_description, price FROM inventory_items WHERE price > 50;
SELECT hub_name, delivery_date, status FROM delivery_hubs JOIN deliveries ON delivery_hubs.hub_id = deliveries.hub_id;
